

## Age

```{r, echo=FALSE}
summary(dat$Age); print(paste("SD:", sd(dat$Age)))
```

## Gender identity

```{r, echo=FALSE}
table(dat$Gender)
```
**TMF scale (femininity subscale):**

```{r, echo=FALSE}
summary(dat$TMF.F); print(paste("SD:", sd(dat$TMF.F)))

```

**TMF scale (masculinity subscale):**


## BMI

